SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_info (birthday, visited, blog_title, seo_keywords, seo_description) values (#{birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{visited,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{blogTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seoKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seoDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_info set birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=BIGINT}, visited = #{visited,jdbcType=BIGINT}, blog_title = #{blogTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_keywords = #{seoKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_description = #{seoDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, birthday, visited, blog_title, seo_keywords, seo_description from tb_info
